reports.topic: Consciousness and sentience in artificial general intelligence: philosophical frameworks, empirical tests, and new ideas
reports.context:
Investigate:
- Integrated Information Theory (IIT) applied to AI systems
- Global Workspace Theory and its relevance to AGI
- New promising methods such as Active Inference, Continuous Learning
- Proposed tests for machine consciousness (beyond Turing test)
- Current debates on whether LLMs exhibit proto-consciousness

Prioritize:
- Recent philosophical papers on machine consciousness
- Community debates on Reddit (r/singularity, r/philosophy)
- Neuroscience perspectives on consciousness
- Practical implications for AGI development
